Four Seasons

Collaboration Proposal

Hey Four Seasons. We're coming to Japan, let's make some magic together.

We've got a vision.


We're a group of content creators heading on a press trip to Japan to explore an off-the-beaten path luxury itinerary -- starting with a week of snowboarding in Niseko, and then road tripping through the country.


We would love to stay exclusively at Four Seasons properties, capturing photo & video content for your social media as well as promoting you to our audiences.

I'm Emilio, aka Eyes of a Nomad

I'm a content creator from Melbourne Australia currently living the dream in Bali, Indonesia. I love helping brands capture the essence of their personality and really telling a story through my work.

I split my time between travelling the world, doing photography & videography for brands, and teaching the next generation of content creators through my school the Institute of Code.

I'm also currently creating an online photography course that will teach students from all over the world how to take epic photos & edit them in lightroom and photoshop, which is launching early 2019.

My Audience

Every single day I have people asking my advice for the perfect photography workflow -- whether it's followers on instagram, students at Institute of Code, or fellow content creators on group trips. I'm always seeking and sharing the latest tools to make life as a photographer easier, and when I find brands that I love, I can't talk about them enough.

My audience is predominately aspiring photographers, influencers and content creators. It's a premium audience that like to invest in quality (our course is a $4.5k investment), believe in the value of community, and generally love travel and adventure.

I've worked with some pretty amazing brands

I've worked with local and international fashion & lifestyle brands, luxury villas and hotels, cafes and restaurants, tour companies and more. My work has been featured by BBC, NYtimes, CNN, Discovery and is re-shared by major instagram accounts like @artofvisuals and @moodygrams. Just a few brands that I've worked with include...

  • The Mulia Resort
  • Pared Sunglasses
  • La Lunia Liveaboad (Luxury Komodo Cruises)
  • Magali Pascal
  • Bricks Milano
  • Ark Swimwear
  • Mimpi Mattress
  • Uluwatu Surf Villas
  • Allie Ayers (Sports Illustrated Model)

We can help you reach a new engaged audience of luxury and adventure travellers.

Our Pitch

We would love to partner with you during our trip to Japan. In exchange for accomodation we can provide the following ...

  • Professional lifestyle photos of your property and surrounding area (including model, styling, shooting, editing etc).
  • 1x 30 second promotional video of each property
  • Promotion in a number of instagram stories on each persons instagram account)
  • Promotion in instagram posts on each persons instagram account (total 8 posts) reaching a total of almost 200,000 people.

Let's Talk

We'd love to discuss your brand and needs further. Send us an email and let's get the ball rolling.
